text: Enywe abasuubila, betsenje abemeleli bobwatoto khulwa Nyasaye, murusinjie omuloli buling’anile. Ne akhusilana nende abandu khulabakhola mwakhaya okhubakholela obuleng’aafu tawe. Khole obuleng’aafu endio nibisitinjia omundu okhuria Nyasaye. Ne murie Nyasaye, Toto Nyasaye alinende abumanyi khu koosi kamukholanga
